description:
When Uncle Akio turns on his TV, the news program "QTV News" is just beginning... and the newscasters are Ashibe-kun and Goma-chan?! All the news stories they read seem very trivial. The news program is followed by "Goma-chan Calisthenics" and "Goma-chan`s Language Lesson"... in fact, it seems all the programs on QTV are rather strange. What kind of program will air next? Don`t change that channel!
Source: crunchyroll
